item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 11–19 April 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 17–25 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra: 4–9 seats
  • Socialni demokrati: 10–17 seats
  • Levica: 4–9 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 0–7 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 0–6 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 0–4 seats
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka: 0 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 0 seats
  • Glas za otroke in družine–Nova ljudska stranka Slovenije: 0 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 17–24 seats
  • Pozitivna Slovenija: 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 11–19 April 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions

item.description:

  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 18.1–25.8%
  • Pozitivna Slovenija: 0.0–1.3%
